pages.privacy-policy: Privacy Policy - LivePokertv: How We Protect Your Personal Information LivePokertv HOME Contact Privacy Policy Welcome to LivePokertv. We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and safeguard your data when you use our services. Information We Collect We may collect the following types of information: Personal Information: Name, email address, contact details, and any other information you provide when you contact us or use our services. Usage Data: Information on how you use our website, such as your IP address, browser type, pages visited, and the time spent on our site. Cookies: Data collected through cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance your experience on our website. How We Use Your Information We use your information to: Provide and improve our poker translation services. Respond to your inquiries and provide customer support. Send you updates, promotions, and other information related to our services. Analyze website usage and improve our website functionality and user experience. The LivePokertv website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline LivePokertv DisclaimersPrivacy & PolicyTerms & Conditions
